overview:
Ashish Kumar is the Founder, Director of Tekriti Software - a Web2.0 Software Product Development company based out of India. He has also co-founded and is the VP Technology of USourceIT - a high-end B2B IT Marketplace for Small to Medium Businesses.

Ashish is a technology entrepreneur and has diversified experience in Technology Selection, Technology Consulting, Sales Lead Generation, Product Design and Development, and day-to-day activities associated with running of a startup.

He has traveled across the world and has worked in three different geographies (India, Singapore and USA). Prior to becoming an entrepreneur, he has a rich technical experience at Microsoft Corporation, Redmond, USA. Over time, Ashish has acquired deep understanding for technologies and their collaboration with business processes.

Ashish holds a B.Tech degree in Computer Science from IIT Kanpur, India.
